/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in vibrant hues of yellow and blue, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many Chinese cities. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the lively atmosphere of the street.
